name: Dragon Age 2: Mark of the Assassin
name_original: Dragon Age 2: Mark of the Assassin
description:
Dragon Age 2: Mark of the Assassin is a RPG game developed by BioWare. It was originally released in 2011. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Dragon Age 2: Mark of the Assassin is available on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
